page.description: Loads the Class Map Overrides Dialog. Allows you to override the way in which any of the Abstract CSS Class Names are mapped to Physical Class Names. When the Component is designed, all of the HTML controls in the component use Abstract CSS Class Names (e.g. [class.gridPartInput]). When the Component is run, the Absrtact CSS Class Names are converted to Physical CSS Class Names (e.g GlassBlueInput). The Class Map is used to convert Abstract CSS Class Names to Physical Class Names
